Metadata.name: GenX.art
Metadata.title: GenX.art - AI Art Video Generator | Photo to Cinematic Art in 30 Seconds
Metadata.description: Upload a photo, pick an art style, get a stunning art video in 30 seconds. 5 unique styles: Cyberpunk, Watercolor, Oil Painting, Anime, Fluid Art. Free to use, no skills needed.

AboutPage.title: About GenX.art
AboutPage.description: GenX.art is an AI-powered art video creation platform that transforms your photos into stunning cinematic art in seconds.
AboutPage.introduction: GenX.art empowers creators to transform ordinary photos into extraordinary art videos. Using advanced AI technology, we make professional-quality video creation accessible to everyone. Our mission is to democratize creative expression—because every frame deserves to be art.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Pricing
pricing.description: Choose the plan that works best for you

item-1.question: Do you offer a free trial?
item-1.answer: Yes, we offer a 7-day free trial.

item-2.question: How do I cancel my subscription?
item-2.answer: You can cancel your subscription by visiting the billing page.

item-3.question: Can I change my plan?
item-3.answer: Yes, you can change your plan at any time by visiting the billing page.

item-4.question: What is the refund policy?
item-4.answer: We offer a 7-day money-back guarantee for monthly/yearly subscriptions and 14 days for lifetime plans. Contact support@genx.art to request a refund.

item-5.question: Can't find what you're looking for?
item-5.answer: Please contact our customer support team at support@genx.art

item-1.name: Jonathan Yombo
item-1.quote: MkSaaS is really extraordinary and very practical, no need to break your head. A real gold mine.

item-2.name: Yves Kalume
item-2.quote: With no experience in webdesign I just redesigned my entire website in a few minutes with tailwindcss thanks to MkSaaS.

item-3.name: Yucel Faruksahan
item-3.quote: Great work on MkSaaS template. This is one of the best personal website that I have seen so far :)

item-4.name: Anonymous author
item-4.quote: I downloaded the one of MkSaaS template which is very clear to understand at the start and you could modify the codes/blocks to fit perfectly on your purpose of the page.

item-5.name: Shekinah Tshiokufila
item-5.quote: MkSaaS is redefining the standard of web design, with these blocks it provides an easy and efficient way for those who love beauty but may lack the time to implement it.

item-6.name: Oketa Fred
item-6.quote: I absolutely love MkSaaS! The component blocks are beautifully designed and easy to use, which makes creating a great-looking website a breeze.

item-7.name: Zeki
item-7.quote: MkSaaS is the perfect fusion of simplicity and versatility, enabling us to create UIs that are as stunning as they are user-friendly.

item-8.name: Joseph Kitheka
item-8.quote: MkSaaS has transformed the way I develop web applications. Their extensive collection of UI components, blocks, and templates has significantly accelerated my workflow.

item-9.name: Khatab Wedaa
item-9.quote: MkSaaS is an elegant, clean, and responsive tailwind css components it's very helpful to start fast with your project.

item-10.name: Rodrigo Aguilar
item-10.quote: I love MkSaaS ❤️. The component blocks are well-structured, simple to use, and beautifully designed. It makes it really easy to have a good-looking website in no time.

item-11.name: Eric Ampire
item-11.quote: MkSaaS templates are the perfect solution for anyone who wants to create a beautiful and functional website without any web design experience.

item-12.name: Roland Tubonge
item-12.quote: MkSaaS is so well designed that even with a very poor knowledge of web design you can do miracles. Let yourself be seduced!

hero.headline: Every Frame is Art
hero.subheadline: Upload a photo, pick an art style, get a stunning art video in 30 seconds. No skills needed. No expensive software.

painPoints.headline: You Have Stories to Tell, But Tools Hold You Back

learning.title: Learning Premiere or After Effects takes months
learning.description: Complex software with steep learning curves keeps your creative ideas trapped.

cost.title: Hiring a professional team costs thousands
cost.description: Quality video production is expensive and out of reach for most creators.

generic.title: Template videos look generic and have no soul
generic.description: Stock templates make your content blend in with everyone else's.

solution.title: GenX Changes Everything
solution.description: All you need is a photo and an idea. AI transforms ordinary into art, everyday into cinematic.

artStyles.headline: Choose Your Art Language
artStyles.subheadline: 5 unique art styles, each carefully tuned, to make your work stand out from the crowd.

cyberpunk.title: Cyberpunk
cyberpunk.description: Flickering neon lights, flying cars, digital rain falling through a cyber world
cyberpunk.bestFor: Best for: Tech content, cool trailers

watercolor.title: Watercolor
watercolor.description: Colors bleeding on paper, like a poem you can see
watercolor.bestFor: Best for: Healing content, emotional expression

oilPainting.title: Oil Painting
oilPainting.description: Every brushstroke carries warmth, turning photos into collectible art
oilPainting.bestFor: Best for: Premium showcases, fine art

anime.title: Anime
anime.description: Step into the anime world, become the hero of your own story
anime.bestFor: Best for: Anime content, young audiences

fluidArt.title: Fluid Art
fluidArt.description: Colors collide and merge in motion, every frame is unique abstract art

howItWorks.headline: Photo to Art in 3 Simple Steps
howItWorks.subheadline: No tutorials needed. Your creativity, GenX delivers.

upload.title: Upload Your Photo
upload.description: Drag & drop your image or click to browse

download.title: Wait for Magic
download.description: AI creates your art video in 30 seconds

howItWorks.bottomText: That's it. No learning curve. No tutorials needed.

gallery.headline: See What Creators Are Making
gallery.subheadline: Art videos from creators around the world using GenX. Click any work to see the style and prompt used.

1.prompt: A neon-lit city street at night, rain falling through holographic advertisements

2.prompt: A serene mountain lake at sunset with soft watercolor effects

3.prompt: A classic portrait in the style of Rembrandt with warm golden lighting

4.prompt: Cherry blossom petals falling in a Japanese garden, anime style

5.prompt: Abstract colors swirling like liquid marble, mesmerizing flow

6.prompt: Flying cars passing through a futuristic cityscape with glitch effects

social.title: Social Media
social.description: Stand out on TikTok, Instagram, YouTube. Same content, different visual impact.

product.title: Product Demos
product.description: Static product shots are boring. Make them flow in artistic styles.

art.title: Art Creation
art.description: No art skills needed. Express your artistic ideas with AI.

content.title: Content Creation
content.description: Tutorials, vlogs, stories—every frame keeps viewers watching longer.

quality.title: Art-Quality Output
quality.description: Not just filters—real style transfer technology. Every frame is crafted by AI.

speed.title: 30-Second Fast
speed.description: Cloud-optimized processing delivers your art video in under 30 seconds.

free.title: Free to Start
free.description: 3 free creates daily. Enough to try and fall in love.

anywhere.title: Works Anywhere
anywhere.description: No downloads needed. Browser-based on any device, anytime, anywhere.

1.name: Sarah Chen
1.content: Finally don't need to learn After Effects! Upload a photo, get a video. My colleagues keep asking what software I use.

2.name: Mike Johnson
2.content: First time I felt like I could actually make artistic videos. So cool!

3.name: Emma Davis
3.content: Cut our product video costs by 80% and the results are even better.

4.name: Alex Kim
4.content: The anime style is incredible. My TikTok engagement went through the roof!

free.question: Is GenX free to use?
free.answer: Yes! Guests can create 3 videos per day for free. Registered users get more daily creates. Need more? Check out our Pro plan for unlimited access.

skills.question: Do I need technical skills?
skills.answer: Not at all! If you can upload a photo and click a button, you can use GenX. We've wrapped complex AI into a simple interface that anyone can use.

commercial.question: Can I use videos commercially?
commercial.answer: Free tier videos are for personal use only. Pro users get full commercial license for business projects, social media marketing, client work, and more.

watermark.question: Do videos have watermarks?
watermark.answer: Free tier videos include a small GenX watermark. Pro users can download completely watermark-free HD videos.

formats.question: What image formats are supported?
formats.answer: We support JPG and PNG formats, up to 10MB per image. Higher resolution original images give better results in your art videos.

time.question: How long does generation take?
time.answer: Usually 15-45 seconds, depending on video length and server load. You'll see real-time progress on screen while your video is being created.

data.question: Where is my data stored? (GDPR)
data.answer: Your data is stored on secure AWS servers in the US and EU. We're GDPR compliant—you can request data deletion anytime. See our Privacy Policy for details.

payment.question: What payment methods do you accept?
payment.answer: We accept Visa, Mastercard, American Express, and PayPal via Stripe. All payments are secure and encrypted.

refund.question: What is your refund policy?
refund.answer: We offer a 7-day money-back guarantee for Pro subscriptions and 14 days for Lifetime plans. Simply contact support@genx.art within the guarantee period and we'll process your refund within 3 business days.

cancel.question: How do I cancel my subscription?
cancel.answer: You can cancel anytime through your account dashboard or by contacting support@genx.art. Your access continues until the end of your billing period, and you won't be charged again.

finalCta.headline: Ready to Create Your First Art Video?
finalCta.subheadline: In 30 seconds, you'll have a stunning art video
